title: Curriculum Development Practical Skills Enhancement: Multicultural Science Communication Competency-Building Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can convert science information reflecting diverse cultural backgrounds into three or more communication formats
Learners can apply science terminology translation guidelines considering cultural differences with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners can collaboratively create science project proposals with multicultural team members using online collaboration tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
